name: Solar System study project
description:
Solar System study project for Coursera, requires .Net to run.

A bit of customization from original project:

1) Scroll mouse wheel to move camera against your target (target is the same left click);

2) Right click will drop your target to the Sun, as default, but will not move the camera to the default position;

3) Listen to the sounds - except Mercury and Venus - planets have their real "sounds" - microwaves recorded and transformed into normal sounds.

Background is a composition of Hubble images, "sounds" are "Spooky Space 'Sounds". All of them are from NASA web site, sounds downloaded from NASA playlists on soundcloud.
